art_1.title: Tech Giants Face New Regulations in AI Development
art_1.abstract: Global regulators are implementing stricter oversight of artificial intelligence development.
art_1.content: In a landmark decision, international regulatory bodies have agreed to establish new guidelines for AI development...
art_1.author: Sarah Chen

art_2.title: Climate Change: Latest Research Shows Accelerated Impact
art_2.abstract: New studies reveal faster-than-expected climate change effects on global ecosystems.
art_2.content: Recent research from leading climate scientists indicates that the pace of global warming has accelerated...
art_2.author: Michael Rodriguez

art_3.title: Global Markets React to Economic Policy Shifts
art_3.abstract: International markets show volatility as major economies adjust monetary policies.
art_3.content: Stock markets worldwide experienced significant fluctuations today as central banks announced new policy measures...
art_3.author: Jennifer Wallace
